About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon, Wed and Thurs 9am-4pm by appointment; closed Tues and school holidays. Reference assistance available by mail and by telephone. Copying services for books, journals, original records to A3, photographs, maps and plans.

About.Access: Advance notice of visit required. Proof of identity required. Closed period of 30 years applies to most records. Access to records not normally available for research can be gained by written permission from the Headmaster.

About.Acquisition focus: The records of Knox Grammar School and its affiliated organisation - Parents Association, Old Boys Association and Mothers Groups, Knox Foundation.

About.Major holdings: Knox Grammar School: Commissioned photos 1924 (2m); Leavers files 1924-1968 (6.4m). The Knox Grammarian 1928-91 (11m). Knox Grammar School Council: Minutes 1923- . Secretary: Subject files 1923- . Headmaster: Subject files 1924- .

About.Guides: Unpublished Concise Guide to Knox Grammar School Archives and Museum.
